Level_3.Name: Improved Critical
Level_3.Description: Your weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20

Level_7.Name: Remarkable Athlete
Level_7.Description: You can add half your proficiency bonus (round up) to any Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution check you make that doesn’t already use your proficiency bonus.

Level_7.Name: Far Jump
Level_7.Description: When you make a running long jump, the distance you can cover increases by a number of feet equal to your Strength modifier.

Level_10.Name: Additional Fighting Style
Level_10.Description: You can choose a second option from the Fighting Style class feature.

Level_15.Name: Superior Critical
Level_15.Description: Your weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 18-20

Level_18.Name: Survivor
Level_18.Description: You attain the pinnacle of resilience in battle. At the start of each of your turns, you regain hit points equal to 5 + your Constitution modifier if you have no more than half of your hit points left. You don’t gain this benefit if you have 0 hit points.
